Detailed Description

DSA sign and verify API.

Function Documentation

DSA_SIG* DSA_do_sign (  const unsigned char *    dgst,
int    dlen,
DSA *    dsa
) 
 

computes a digital signature on the len byte message and returns in DSA_SIG

Parameters:
dgst  Message to be signed
dlen  Length of the input message
dsa  Private key for the sign

int DSA_sign (  int    type,
const unsigned char *    dgst,
int    dlen,
unsigned char *    sig,
unsigned int *    siglen,
DSA *    dsa
) 
 

computes a digital signature on the len byte message

Parameters:
type  Not supported as of now
dgst  Message to be signed
dlen  Length of the input message
sig  Signature generated
siglen  Length of the signature generated is stored here
dsa  Private key for the sign
